welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.subtitle: A new journey awaits...
welcome.legalAction: Confirm you've read and accept the

shimmer.secondary: Experimental network with the latest features

custom.secondary: Connect to any network with custom settings

new.secondary: Create a new profile with a mnemonic or Ledger Nano

restore.secondary: Restore existing profile with a backup or Ledger Nano

claim.secondary: Claim staking rewards using an IOTA backup

software.secondary: Store keys in a Stronghold file with your recovery phrase

hardware.secondary: Use the keys stored on your Ledger Nano device

viewMnemonic.title: Record your recovery phrase
viewMnemonic.description: This recovery phrase is your most important secret. It is the master key to all your funds. Do not show this to anyone.

verifyMnemonic.title: Verify your recovery phrase
verifyMnemonic.description: Let’s check you wrote down your phrase correctly. Please select the word with the corresponding number below.

verifyMnemonicSuccess.title: Recovery phrase matched
verifyMnemonicSuccess.description: Remember to keep your copies private and secure

installLedger.title: Install the Ledger app
installLedger.description: Use Ledger Live to find and install the required app on your Ledger Nano device.

connectLedger.title: Connect your Ledger to Bloom
connectLedger.description: Please ensure that the official Ledger Live application is closed and follow the steps below.
connectLedger.unlock: Unlock your Ledger with its pin
connectLedger.open: Open the Shimmer app on your Ledger
connectLedger.tip: Tips if your Ledger isn't connecting

ledgerConnectionGuide.title: Ledger isn't connecting?
ledgerConnectionGuide.ledgerLiveNotOpen: Ensure the Ledger Live app is not open on your computer
ledgerConnectionGuide.ledgerDeviceUnlocked: Ensure your Ledger device is unlocked with your PIN
ledgerConnectionGuide.ledgerAppOpen: Open the {appName} app on your Ledger device

mnemonic.secondary: Restore keys with a 12 or 24 word recovery phrase

file.secondary: Restore profile with a Stronghold backup file

hardware.secondary: Restore profile with a Ledger Nano device

claimFinder.title: Claim your Shimmer rewards
claimFinder.description: Use the balance finder below, and check if your Shimmer staking rewards balance is correct before claiming.

inputMnemonic.title: Enter your recovery phrase
inputMnemonic.description: A recovery phrase is a 12 or 24 word master key to all your funds that you will have recorded when making an existing profile. Enter it below and separate each word with spaces.

importStronghold.title: Import your backup file
importStronghold.description: Drop your Stronghold backup file or choose one from the file explorer to restore your profile.

unlockBackup.title: Unlock your backup
unlockBackup.description: Please provide the password for the backup below to decrypt your keys.

encryptMnemonic.title: Secure your profile
encryptMnemonic.description: Make your password highly secure to encrypt your keys. This will be required to send tokens and assets.

enterName.title: Give your profile a name
enterName.description: Be as creative as you like! You can change this later.

enterPin.title: Add a PIN number
enterPin.description: The 6-digit PIN gives you quick entry to your profile and helps prevent unwanted access.

theme.title: Tema
theme.advice: If you change your system theme, you may need to restart Bloom to see the effects

exportStronghold.title: Eksportere sikkerhedskopi
exportStronghold.description: Eksportér til en Stronghold-fil - en komplet, krypteret sikkerhedskopi af wallets og seneste transaktionshistorik

autoLogout.title: Automatic logout
autoLogout.description: Inactivity time before your wallets lock and you are logged out

strongholdTimeout.title: Stronghold timeout
strongholdTimeout.description: Length of time before your Stronghold password is required again

maxMediaSize.title: Maks. mediestørrelse
maxMediaSize.description: NFT-mediestørrelser over end denne grænse downloades ikke, men en pladsholder for medietypen vises i stedet

maxMediaDownloadTime.title: Maks. downloadtid
maxMediaDownloadTime.description: NFT-medie, hvis downloadtid overskrider denne grænse, afbrydes, og en pladsholder for medietypen vises i stedet

refreshNftMedia.title: Opdatér NFT-medier
refreshNftMedia.description: NFT-medier, cachelagret for denne konto, slettes og gendownloades derefter

changePassword.title: Skift adgangskode
changePassword.description: Adgangskoden bruges til at sikre wallets. Der skal bruges en stærk adgangskode for at beskytte dine midler

changePincode.title: Skift PIN-kode
changePincode.description: PIN-koden holder saldo og transaktioner fortrolige

hiddenAccounts.title: Hidden accounts
hiddenAccounts.description: Valg af denne indstilling vil vise wallets, som tidligere var skjult

deleteProfile.title: Slet profil
deleteProfile.description: Sletter hele profilen, wallets og transaktionshistorik. Sørg for at have en sikkerhedskopi

deepLinks.title: Deep links
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Bloom upon clicking a deep link starting with {appProtocol}://

errorLog.title: Fejllog
errorLog.description: Vis fejl for at fejlfinde et problem

crashReporting.title: Nedbrudsrapporter
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Bloom by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs
crashReporting.advice: Please restart the Bloom application to {sendCrashReports, select, true {start sharing crash reports} false {stop sharing crash reports} other {apply this change}}

troubleshoot.title: Fejlfinding
troubleshoot.description: Brug fejlfindingsguiden til at løse almindelige problemer

documentation.title: Dokumentation
documentation.description: Se dokumentationen for dybdegående forklaringer om hvordan tingene fungerer

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Se ofte stillede spørgsmål for at få hjælp til et typisk problem eller spørgsmål

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Få hjælp fra IOTA-fællesskabet på Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Rapporter et problem
reportAnIssue.description: Rapporter en fejl til udviklerne. Tjek igennem for at sikre, at den ikke allerede er blevet rapporteret

developerToggle.title: Udviklertilstand
developerToggle.description: Slå Udviklertilstand til for at aktivere flere funktioner i eksperimentel tilstand

login.hintStronghold: Aktuel Stronghold-version forældet, log ind for at opdatere.

maxAttempts.title: Couldn't sign you in
maxAttempts.body2: incorrect PIN code {times, plural, one {# time} other {# times}}.
maxAttempts.body3: For security purposes, your profile has been temporarily locked. Please wait for

errors.aliasAddressWrongFormat: Skal være enten i hex- eller Bech32-format

connectLedgerDevice.title: Tilslut Ledger-enheden
connectLedgerDevice.body: For your Ledger device to be found by Bloom, please ensure that the official Ledger Live application is closed before following these steps.

configureNodeList.title: Node configuration
configureNodeList.description: Manage the list of nodes you connect to
configureNodeList.noNodes: There are no nodes, unable to connect to the network

localProofOfWork.title: Proof of work
localProofOfWork.description: Complete proof of work locally on your device or outsource to the node

removeContact.title: Remove contact
removeContact.body: Are you sure you want to remove this contact?
removeContact.hint: Please note after removing a contact Bloom will show its actual addresses.

removeNetworkAddresses.title: Remove network addresses
removeNetworkAddresses.body: Are you sure you want to remove the contact’s {network} network addresses?
removeNetworkAddresses.hint: Please note after removing a contact’s network addresses Bloom will no longer associate it with them in transactions or activities.

dappsList.title: Connected dApps
dappsList.hint: WalletConnect allows you to connect Bloom with dApps directly or with a connection code.

inputConnectionCode.title: Connect to a dApp
inputConnectionCode.hint: Add new dApps by adding a Wallet Connect code below.
inputConnectionCode.deprecated: The dApp you try to connect to uses a deprecated version of WalletConnect. Cannot establish connection

confirmConnection.title: Connect with an application
confirmConnection.hint: A third party service wants to connect with your wallet for the first time. You can choose if you wish to trust this connection.
confirmConnection.insecure: The URL for this dApp cannot be verified. Your connection to this application may not be secure.
confirmConnection.acceptInsecureConnection: I understand this dApp may be insecure and still want to connect.

details.title: Connection details
details.name: Name
details.disconnectDescription: Do you want to disconnect from {dappName}

backup.body: You have not backed up your profile yet! We highly recommend backing this up in case you lose access to this device.

version.body: You are currently using an early version of Bloom.

update.body: A new Bloom update is available today.

gallery.title: Samlinger
gallery.emptyDescription: Deposit or receive your first collectible!

details.storageDepositDescription: En refunderbar tokenindbetaling kræves for at gemme NFT'en på Tangle.

details.hintVote: Du kan ikke stemme på et forslag, der er i annonceringsfasen. Afstemningen åbner om {time}.

update.title: Update your Stronghold
update.loginBody: Aktuel Stronghold-version forældet. Angiv adgangskode for at opdatere den.
update.recoveryBody: Importeret Stronghold-version forældet. For at fortsætte, skal den opdateres til seneste version.

updateBackup.title: Stronghold updated
updateBackup.loginBody: Alt er fint nu - den seneste Stronghold-version anvendes
updateBackup.recoveryBody: Opsætningen af en wallet kan nu fortsættes
updateBackup.hint: Det anbefales kraftigt at slette alle tidligere Stronghold-sikkerhedskopifiler og generere en ny

changePassword.title: Change your password
changePassword.hint: Your Stronghold was out of date and has been updated. We recommend that you change your password.

enableLedgerBlindSigning.title: Aktivér Blind Signering
enableLedgerBlindSigning.info: You need to enable Blind Signing on your Ledger device to confirm this transaction.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_1: Connect and unlock your Ledger device
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_3: Press the right button to navigate to Settings, then press both buttons to validate. Your Ledger device displays Blind Signing.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_4: Tryk på begge knapper for at aktivere blind signeringstransaktion. Enheden vises Aktiveret. Det var dét.

unavailable.title: Unavailable
unavailable.subtitle: Locked or temporarily unavailable in transactions

basicOutputs.title: Native tokens
basicOutputs.subtitle: Reserveret til lagring af Henhørende Tokener

foundryOutputs.title: Produktion
foundryOutputs.subtitle: Reserveret til lagring af Henhørende Tokener Produktion

storageDepositReturn.title: Storage deposit return
storageDepositReturn.subtitle: Temporarily locked in Storage Deposit Return

minimizeStorageDeposit.title: Minimize storage deposit
minimizeStorageDeposit.description: Consolidate outputs to minimize your required storage deposit and increase your available balance.

password.title: Adgangskode påkrævet
password.subtitle: Please provide your password to unlock your wallets
password.backup: Indtast din adgangskode for at eksportere en sikkerhedskopi

appUpdate.title: Søg efter opdateringer
appUpdate.updatesDisabled: Opdateringer er tilgængelige, men in-app opgradering er deaktiveret for operativsystemet.
appUpdate.latestInstalled: Den seneste og sikreste version af Firefly anvendes

backupStronghold.title: Backup your stronghold file
backupStronghold.body: It is important to back up your wallet regularly to ensure you have a copy of your wallets and transaction history. If you lose your backup and recovery phrase you will lose access to your funds.

deeplinkAccountSwitch.title: Select an account
deeplinkAccountSwitch.body: Du har netop fulgt et dybt link. Vælg den wallet, der skal fortsættes med.

deeplinkError.title: Fejl i link
deeplinkError.body: Link er fejlbehæftet eller ugyldigt. Forsøg igen eller dobbelttjek linkets kilde.

deleteAccount.title: Slet {name}?
deleteAccount.body: Sikker på, at denne wallet skal slettes?
deleteAccount.hint: Bemærk: Når først slettet, kan denne wallet gendannes vha. "Wallet Finder" i indstillingerne.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Indtast din wallet adgangskode for at bekræfte.

externalUrl.title: Open URL in Browser
externalUrl.body: Are you sure you want to open "{url}" in the browser?
externalUrl.invalidProtocol: Cannot open URL with invalid protocol

excludeNode.title: Udeluk node
excludeNode.body: Sikker på, at {url} skal udelukkes fra den tilgængelige nodepulje?

unsetAsPrimaryNode.title: Ryd primærnode
unsetAsPrimaryNode.body: Sikker på, at {url} skal ryddes som den primære node?

node.removeConfirmation: Er du sikker på, at du vil du fjerne denne node?

deleteProfile.title: Slet profil
deleteProfile.confirmation: Er du sikker på, at du vil slette denne profil? Denne handling kan ikke fortrydes.
deleteProfile.typePassword: Indtast din adgangskode for at bekræfte.

transaction.surplusIncluded: Denne transaktion indeholder et overskudsbeløb. Dobbelttjek, at dette er dét beløb, der ønskes sendt.

walletFinder.title: Sync accounts
walletFinder.body: Perform a more exhaustive search of addresses to find missing balances and wallets.
walletFinder.searchAgainHint: Is your balance or number of wallets incorrect? Search again until your full balance is shown.

ledgerNotConnected.title: Tilslut Ledger-enheden
ledgerNotConnected.appNotOpen: Åbn Shimmer-appen på Ledger-enheden for at fortsætte.

verifyLedgerTransaction.title: Bekræft transaktion
verifyLedgerTransaction.info: Sammenlign og bekræft transaktionsoplysningerne vist på Ledger-enheden med nedenstående oplysninger.

verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.title: Bekræft intern transaktion
verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.info: Bekræft den interne transaktion på Ledger-enheden.
verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.hint: Alle aktiver forblive i ens wallet, når man sender en intern transaktion.

verifyMessageSigning.title: Verify message signing
verifyMessageSigning.info: Please confirm the message signing on your ledger.

crashReporting.title: Crash reporting
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Bloom by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs. If selected, this will take effect after restarting Bloom.
crashReporting.checkbox: Send crash reports to the IOTA Foundation

signMessage.title: Sign message
signMessage.hint: No balance will be sent to {dappName} in the process of signing this message.
signMessage.warning: dApp cannot be determined. No balance will be sent in the process of signing this message.

legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyBody: We have updated Bloom's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosBody: We have updated Bloom's Terms of Service.
legalUpdate.privPolicyBody: We have updated Bloom's Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
legalUpdate.tosCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service
legalUpdate.privPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Privacy Policy

tokenInformation.verificationWarning: Dette token er ubekræftet. Sammenlign tokenmetadataene med det relevante teams officielle websted. Bekræft kun tokener, som der er tillid til.

noAlias.title: Unable to mint
noAlias.description: You must own an alias output to mint native tokens. To continue, please create an alias first

errors.invalidMimetype: Ugyldig MimeType. Tjek om filtypen understøttes
errors.invalidURI: URI ugyldig, angiv en gyldig i stedet
errors.notReachable: URI utilgængelig, NFT-type kan ikke tjekkes
errors.royaltiesMustBeJSON: Royalties skal være en gyldig JSON
errors.invalidAddress: Ugyldig adresse. Skal være en gyldig {networkHrp}-adresse, hvortil royalties sendes
errors.invalidRoyaltyValue: Ugyldig værdi. Skal være en numerisk decimal repræsentant for den ønskede procentdel, dvs. 0,05
errors.invalidRoyaltyValueSum: Ugyldig værdi. Summen af alle royalties skal være mindre end eller lig med 1'
errors.attributesMustBeJSON: Attributter skal være en gyldig JSON
errors.attributesInvalidKeys: Ugyldig nøgle. Attributter skal inkludere nøglerne "trait_type" samt "værdi"
errors.attributesInvalidValues: Ugyldig værdi. "trait_type" skal være en ikke-tom streng og "værdi" skal være en ikke-tom streng eller et tal

faucetRequest.title: Faucet-anmodning
faucetRequest.body: Sikker på, at der skal anmodes om {token} tokener fra {network}-faucet'en?

manageVotingPower.title: Håndtér stemmeret
manageVotingPower.body: Definér stemmeretten for at stemme om forslag.
manageVotingPower.hint: Alle midler tildelt afstemningen er låst. For at gøre dem omsætbare igen, skal stemmeretten reduceres. Det påvirker alle forslag med aktiv afstemning.
manageVotingPower.amountZero: Bemærk venligst, at sætter man stemmeretten til nul, stoppes alle ens stemmer for alle forslag, som man pt. stemmer om/på.

addProposal.title: Tilføj forslag
addProposal.body: Angiv nedenstående oplysninger for at tilføje et forslag.
addProposal.addToAllAccounts: Add the proposal to all accounts

editProposal.title: Redigér forslag
editProposal.body: Angiv den nye URL til noden indeholdende dette forslag.

voteForProposal.title: Vote for proposal
voteForProposal.body: Du er ved at stemme på {proposal} forslag.
voteForProposal.hasAbstained: Du undlader at besvare {numberOfQuestions, plural, one {# spørgsmål} other {# spørgsmål}}.
voteForProposal.noVotingPower: Ingen stemmeret. Øg stemmeretten fra Governance-kontrolpanelet.

revote.title: Stem igen om forslag
revote.body: Ændrer man sin stemmeret, stoppes ens stemmer om/på alle forslag midlertidigt i at blive optalt. Klik blot på "Revote" for at genoptage afstemningen.
revote.hint: Bloom remembers all of the proposals and answer options you previously voted for.

removeProposal.title: Remove proposal
removeProposal.body: Are you sure you want to remove this proposal?
removeProposal.hint: Please note that removing a proposal during the counting period will stop your votes but won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

stopVoting.title: Stop voting
stopVoting.body: You're about to stop voting for the {proposalName} proposal.
stopVoting.hint: Please note that stopping voting during the counting period won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

nodeAuthRequired.title: Authentication required
nodeAuthRequired.body: This node requires additional authentication. Please fill in the appropriate information.

receiveAddress.title: Receive
receiveAddress.body: Receive tokens, NFTs, and other digital assets to your account address shown below.

confirmRejection.title: Reject transaction
confirmRejection.description: Are you sure you want to reject this transaction?
confirmRejection.node: Please note that rejecting a transaction only hides it from your Activity feed

confirmTokenBurn.title: Burn {assetName}
confirmTokenBurn.hint: Please note that burning a token may free storage deposit attached to it and is not reversible

confirmNftBurn.title: Burn {nftName}
confirmNftBurn.description: Are you sure you want to burn this NFT?
confirmNftBurn.hint: Bemærk, at brænding af en NFT frigør det tilknyttede lagerindestående, og at det er irreversibelt.

refreshNftMedia.description: Slet og gendownload alle NFT-medier for denne konto?

incoming.timelockDate: Afsender opsatter en tidslås for disse midler. De vil kunne bruges, når tidslåsen udløber.
incoming.metadata: Et valgfrit datafelt til at lagre data vedvarende på Tangle.
incoming.tag: Et kort valgfrit datafelt. Tagning af grupper af transaktioner kan gøre dem lettere at fremsøge.

outgoing.storageDeposit: Et lagerdepositum, der er refunderbart, kræves for at gemme transaktionen på Tangle.
outgoing.giftedStorageDeposit: Modtageren behøver ikke at tilbagebetale depositummet.
outgoing.expirationTime: Indløser modtageren ikke i tide, får man sine tokener returneret.
outgoing.timelockDate: Tidslås føjet til denne transaktion. Modtageren vil ikke kunne bruge disse midler, før tidslåsen udløber.
outgoing.metadata: Et valgfrit datafelt til at lagre data vedvarende på Tangle.
outgoing.tag: Et kort valgfrit datafelt. Tagning af grupper af transaktioner kan gøre dem lettere at fremsøge.
outgoing.transactionFee: The transaction fee contains the gas fee for the code execution and the storage deposit fee.

nftMetadata.type: The MimeType of the NFT. e.g. image/png.

mintNativeToken.decimals: IRC30 optional parameter: Number of decimals the token uses (divide the token amount by 10^decimals to get its user representation).
mintNativeToken.description: IRC30 optional parameter: The human-readable description of the token.
mintNativeToken.url: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to more resources about the token like a website or social media page.
mintNativeToken.logoUrl: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to an image resource of the token logo.

mintNftForm.royalties: Optional parameter: An object containing key-value pairs of addresses that map to payout percentages
mintNftForm.issuerName: Optional parameter: The name of the creator
mintNftForm.description: Optional parameter: A description of the NFT
mintNftForm.attributes: Optional parameter: An array of traits and values that define attributes of the NFT
mintNftForm.uri: To create a URI using custom media, first upload your file to IPFS via a storage service (e.g. https://nft.storage/)
mintNftForm.quantity: Valgfri parameter: Mængden af kopier mintet med disse metadata.

governance.removeProposalWarning: Før dette forslag fjernes, skal man ophøre med at stemme på det.

outdatedNode.title: Forældet node-URL
outdatedNode.body: Node-URL'en til dette forslag er forældet. Opdatér den for at tilgå de seneste afstemningsresultater.

resultsNotAvailable.title: Resultater utilgængelige
resultsNotAvailable.body: Resultaterne er ikke længere tilgængelige på dette forslags relaterede node. Opdatér den for at tilgå resultaterne.

updateStronghold.profileBadge: Aktuel Stronghold forældet. Log ind for at opdatere.

tokenIsNotVerified.title: Token is not verified
tokenIsNotVerified.text: Compare the token metadata against the relevant team’s official website. Only verify tokens that you trust.
